backend/main.mo: Backend canister implementing authorization, app passwords, session unlocks, user profiles, and project CRUD with per-user and admin access rules.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module resetting project-related state while preserving legacy password, session, and profile data.
feature_evidence.json: Evidence report listing features, related source files, components, and test IDs for project‑creation UX work.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI, authentication, and utilities.
frontend/.gitignore: Gitignore rules for frontend dependencies, build outputs, IDE files, OS files, and mobile build artifacts.
frontend/android/.gitkeep: Placeholder file to keep the android directory in version control.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor configuration specifying app metadata, webDir, mobile schemes, and plugin settings like SplashScreen.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light and dark theme color tokens and layout settings.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML template configuring meta tags, PWA assets, icons, and runtime env injection before loading the app.
frontend/ios/.gitkeep: Placeholder file to keep the ios directory in version control.
frontend/MOBILE_RELEASE.md: Guide for building and submitting the mobile app to iOS and Android stores with prerequisites and steps.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, theme, icons, start URL, and display mode.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App entry wiring routes, layouts, protected pages with UnlockGate, and global providers like theme and toasts.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling II authentication, error recovery, and query cache clearing.
Auth gate that redirects unauthenticated or locked non-admin users and allows access only when requirements are met.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Footer showing copyright and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Page layout wrapper with navigation, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNav.ts: Navigation bar that conditionally renders links based on authentication status.
frontend/src/components/settings/AppPass: UI panel for changing, resetting, and locking the app password with dialog interactions.
frontend/src/features/beat-maker/audioEn: Real-time audio engine that synthesizes kick, snare, and hihat sounds using the Web Audio API.
frontend/src/features/beat-maker/renderT: Offline renderer that synthesizes a full pattern to an audio buffer and encodes it as a WAV file.
frontend/src/features/beat-maker/useStep: Hook managing step-sequencer state, playback timing, and audio triggering.
frontend/src/features/beat-maker/wavEnco: Utility to encode an AudioBuffer into a 16‑bit PCM WAV Blob.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppPassword.ts: Provides functions to unlock and save an app password by hashing input and interacting with the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppPasswordManagem: Adds higher‑level password flows such as change, lock, and reset on top of useAppPassword.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerRole.ts: Fetches the caller's role or admin status from the backend and exposes loading and fetched flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useCapacitorDeepLinks: Empty file placeholder for deep‑link handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a provider and hook managing Internet Identity login, state, and stored delegation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useProjects.ts: Provides hooks to list and create projects with automatic unlock handling and navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps queries and mutations for getting and saving the caller's user profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useUnlockStatus.ts: Queries whether the current user session is unlocked, keyed by principal.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and utilities.
frontend/src/lib/backendCallWithUnlock.t: Wraps backend calls to detect locked errors and redirect or invoke a handler while preserving return paths.
frontend/src/lib/lockedError.ts: Detects whether an error message indicates a locked or expired session.
frontend/src/lib/projectAudioImport.ts: Stub for importing audio into projects, currently logging details and throwing unimplemented.
frontend/src/lib/returnToContext.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears a return‑to path in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/BeatMakerPage.tsx: Step‑sequencer UI with playback, BPM control, WAV export, and navigation to project import.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login, admin routing, popup detection, and error display with feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Lists user projects, handles creation via dialog, and provides empty‑state onboarding.
Loads a selected project and shows a placeholder workspace with upcoming recording and editing features.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Displays user profile, app password management, and general app info.
frontend/src/pages/UnlockPage.tsx: Manages account unlock flow with password creation, validation, redirects, and admin bypass.
frontend/src/security/hashAppPassword.ts: Implements PBKDF2 password hashing with a fixed salt and returns a hex‑encoded hash.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear stored or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings using multiple plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current state, architecture notes, issues, and existing feature definitions for the Thunderlab app.
